titles.title: A resolution designating the week of October 2 through October 8, 2011, as "National Nurse-Managed Health Clinic Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/13/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the week of October 2-October 8, 2011, as National Nurse-Managed Health Clinic Week and expresses support for its goals and ideals.Encourages the expansion of such clinics so that they may continue to serve as health care workforce development sites for the next generation of primary care providers.
